narrationLines:
Welcome to Project Fox!
Press Space to advance the dialogue

Use the directional keys or WASD to move around,
and press Space to interact with things

Also remember players, click both shift and p to save game while shift 
and enter to load saved game!

Press U any time to replay the narration for the current area.
Have fun!
Isn't that the wizard castle? Be careful! I heard he's kinda strong!
Take out the mobs and head up to and fight the wizard!
Look it's the wizard! Defeat him in order to win the game!
